TopicTitle: How many pod interiors are there?

Articles.Content: How many pod interiors are there to choose from and can someone post a picture of all of them? I am trying to best mimic the Gemini interior.
I do not think that they are available in this version, but on the loading screen there are about three different interiors.
They are in the game, in the portrait cams at bottom-right of the screen. And yes, I seem to remember there are three listed while the game loads.
I\'m sorry, I was referring to IVAs when I said that they are not available yet. The OP may not have even been referring to IVAs now that I think of it.

I\'m sorry, I was referring to IVAs when I said that they are not available yet. The OP may not have even been referring to IVAs now that I think of it.

I wasn\'t. Just talking about the crew portraits, is all.
